name: smolproducts.com
slogan: DNVB - Disrupting one of the oldest FMCG markets in the world
description: smol sells the most effective concentrated laundry capsule to anyone who washes clothes ie. everyone. Our products are eco-friendly, but work just as well as the leading brands and are delivered to your door at half the price. With over 10,000 glowing reviews and hundreds of thousands of customers after only 18 months in the market we have huge ambitions to take a big piece of a tired FMCG marketplace.

jobs.title: Customer Service Super Star!
jobs.description:
We have several really exciting opportunities to join our small and fast growing company. 
Smol is looking for friendly, proactive and positive people to join our fun loving, award winning customer service team!
jobs.descriptionHtml:
We have several really exciting opportunities to join our small and fast growing company.
Smol is looking for friendly, proactive and positive people to join our fun loving, award winning customer service team!

jobs.title: Digital Marketeer
jobs.description: We are looking for a digital marketeer with a love for growth, analytics and tech. They need to be hungry to learn and be able to demonstrate a natural curiosity to analyse information, creative enough to come up with ideas, organisation skills to plan and execute projects, and the ability to be self motivated and work hard under pressure.
jobs.descriptionHtml: We are looking for a digital marketeer with a love for growth, analytics and tech. They need to be hungry to learn and be able to demonstrate a natural curiosity to analyse information, creative enough to come up with ideas, organisation skills to plan and execute projects, and the ability to be self motivated and work hard under pressure.

jobs.title: Marketing/Project Manager
jobs.description: Looking for super smart, "apply yourself to anything" kind of people with drive and ambition to grow within a fast paced tech start-up. The candidate will ideally have a business/marketing degree from a top university and 1-2 years experience within a start-up environment.
